query:
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.slug, m.disciplineId, m.order, m.visible, COUNT(p.id) as pageCount 
FROM modules m 
LEFT JOIN pages p ON m.id = p.moduleId 
GROUP BY m.id 
ORDER BY m.disciplineId, m.order;
